The '''Blessing of the Welkin Moon''' is a US$4.99 (€4.99) 30 day subscription offer in ''[[Genshin Impact]]''. Upon buying the blessing, players will immediately obtain 300 [[Genesis Crystal]]s and will continue to receive 90 [[Primogem]]s every day they log in for the next 30 days. Failure to log in will result in a day being deducted from the Blessing without the player receiving any Primogems.

It can be purchased multiple times to extend its duration as long as the current duration does not exceed 180 days (6 total purchases). It is not an auto renewing subscription, so it needs to be purchased manually once the duration has expired.

The {{Item|Blessing of the Welkin Moon - New Moon}} item can be obtained from limited time [[Web Event]]s to receive 30 days of Blessing of the Welkin Moon rewards when used.

==Total Rewards==
Over a 30-day period this totals up to:

==Descriptions==
{{Description|'''Blessing of the Welkin Moon'''<br>Each time you purchase Blessing of the Welkin Moon, you will immediately receive 300 Genesis Crystals and 30 days of the Blessing.<br>During this 30-day period, you can claim 90 Primogems each day when you log in. (Refreshes daily at 4:00 AM (GMT+8/GMT+1/GMT-5))<br><br>'''Important Points'''<br>1. The duration of the Blessing of the Welkin Moon can only be extended if its remaining duration is 180 days or less.<br>2. You cannot purchase an additional blessing if your remaining duration exceeds 180 days. If unique circumstances result in a repeat purchase anyway, the duration will not be extended, and instead you will be refunded 330 Genesis Crystals directly.<br>3. There will be no refund for any Primogems that are not claimed via login during the Blessing's duration.|Shop: About Blessing of the Welkin Moon}}
